contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 24th day of October, 2012, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED, the Order of the Superior Court is VACATED, and this matter is REMANDED to the Superior Court for reconsideration of the trial court’s analysis, and preparation of an opinion, in light of Commonwealth v. Bradford, 46 A.3d 693 (Pa.2012).
